body:
Lol yeah, what I'm upset about isn't that the restriction exists, but that the admins say it's a TOS violation while it's not stated anywhere in the TOS. In the beginning, I thought that it was a clearly defined rule, but when I looked, I couldn't find anything about it, so I started mass-posting about klenvastergan's ban.

I don't have any hard feelings towards the admins, but I do wish that they can 1. Unban Klenny, and 2. Clearly state the restriction along with the punishment in the TOS or the Content Policy.

<sup> - sfrohne [If you're going to post a screenshot of this comment, **don't** censor my username]</sup>

post.body:
[klenvastergan](https://ruqqus.com/@klenvastergan)

According to arkitekt on Discord, he got a 7 day ban, while his alts got permabanned.

Apparently fifthfiend was one of his alts (well, that's unfortunate because I used to look at his post history to find posts about Ruqqus censorship...)

According to captainmeta4, "temp ban users are protected from siege", but that doesn't seem to be the case right now. As an example, +Klenvastergan got sieged by @AsininePorcupine

He's using the account @Klenny right now, I think.

Note: The 10 guild limit was not stated in the [TOS](https://web.archive.org/web/20201126025147/https://ruqqus.com/help/terms) or [Content Policy](https://web.archive.org/web/20201126025514/https://ruqqus.com/help/rules) at the time of the ban. @captainmeta4 says that it counted as "[breaking ruqqus](https://ruqqus.com/+Klenvastergan/post/571e/lmao-i-am-literally-such-a/hzox)".

Edit: [The admins are discussing the possibility of adding a line like "don't use multiple accounts to circumvent per-user limitations" to the TOS](https://ruqqus.com/+Klenvastergan/post/571e/lmao-i-am-literally-such-a/hzqm).

Edit 2020-11-29:

Another one of his alts was JennaThorne. On that account, he modded guilds like [LGBDropTheT](https://archive.is/V2FkY), [GenderCynical](https://archive.is/R0u5P), [RuqqusDrama](https://archive.is/Wa88B), [GBTDropTheL](https://archive.is/xhKFA), [bdsm, and Censored](https://ruqqus.com/+general/post/wjf/interesting-practice-on-ruqqus/2e8l). Around July 2020, he apparently "bullied" WillieOffThePickleBoat [by yanking his posts to the last two guilds](https://ruqqus.com/+general/post/wjf/interesting-practice-on-ruqqus/2gbk).

Edit 2020-12-04: [Oh, uh, well then](https://ruqqus.com/+DeuxRAMA/post/5gj1/after-all-the-whining-i-did)

Edit 2020-12-09: [Apparently @norferner and @brisbane got banned for the same reason too. Hm, I wonder who they were.](https://ruqqus.com/+unitedkingdom/post/5lo8/meta-this-guild-is-under-new)

**Update on 2020-11-27:**

The admins have put out an announcement on the upcoming TOS update. You can view it [here](https://ruqqus.com/+Ruqqus/post/583k/terms-of-service-update-for-27).

@klenvastergan will indeed be [getting his guilds back](https://ruqqus.com/+Ruqqus/post/583k/terms-of-service-update-for-27/i3hp).
post.body_html:
klenvastergan

According to arkitekt on Discord, he got a 7 day ban, while his alts got permabanned.

Apparently fifthfiend was one of his alts (well, that's unfortunate because I used to look at his post history to find posts about Ruqqus censorship...)

According to captainmeta4, "temp ban users are protected from siege", but that doesn't seem to be the case right now. As an example, +Klenvastergan got sieged by @AsininePorcupine

He's using the account @Klenny right now, I think.

Note: The 10 guild limit was not stated in the TOS or Content Policy at the time of the ban. @captainmeta4 says that it counted as "breaking ruqqus".

Edit: The admins are discussing the possibility of adding a line like "don't use multiple accounts to circumvent per-user limitations" to the TOS.

Edit 2020-11-29:

Another one of his alts was JennaThorne. On that account, he modded guilds like LGBDropTheT, GenderCynical, RuqqusDrama, GBTDropTheL, bdsm, and Censored. Around July 2020, he apparently "bullied" WillieOffThePickleBoat by yanking his posts to the last two guilds.

Edit 2020-12-04: Oh, uh, well then

Edit 2020-12-09: Apparently @norferner and @brisbane got banned for the same reason too. Hm, I wonder who they were.

Update on 2020-11-27:

The admins have put out an announcement on the upcoming TOS update. You can view it here.

@klenvastergan will indeed be getting his guilds back.

parent.body:
The main account isn't banned, right? Or throttled/shadowbanned in any way?

I can see why making multiple accounts to circumvent per-user limitations is a pretty bad violation, or should be. It's not like having a throwaway and a highly-identifying account separately. Voting rings should be a bad violation as well, the site won't work if that stuff is allowed and a number of users just go wild at that.

body:
3 questions: 1. Will you be unbanning Klenny before the 7 days ends? At the time he broke the rule, it was unclear that the rule even existed\*, and I don't agree with banning someone for unclear rules like this. 2. Will you be giving him his guilds back on his main account? 3. Are his alts gone forever?

\*Let's say I hypothetically have 10 alts, and I mod 8 different guilds on each of them. As far as I know, I will never encounter the "10 guilds limit" message, and thus I won't have a way of telling that the limit exists.

<sup> - sfrohne [If you're going to post a screenshot of this comment, **don't** censor my username]</sup>
body_html:
3 questions: 1. Will you be unbanning Klenny before the 7 days ends? At the time he broke the rule, it was unclear that the rule even existed*, and I don't agree with banning someone for unclear rules like this. 2. Will you be giving him his guilds back on his main account? 3. Are his alts gone forever?

*Let's say I hypothetically have 10 alts, and I mod 8 different guilds on each of them. As far as I know, I will never encounter the "10 guilds limit" message, and thus I won't have a way of telling that the limit exists.

- sfrohne [If you're going to post a screenshot of this comment, don't censor my username]

body:
Lol, Ruqqies, if you like hidden rules so much, then why do you hate reddit? It sounds like the perfect site for you!

There, you can go gloat about how "obvious" it is that posting about powermods is harassment, and how "obvious" it is that making subreddits about "election fraud" is impersonation!

>Why do you think they don't let single accounts have more then 10 guilds

I don't know, maybe they thought it would be too hard to manage that many guilds with a single account? I know that's not the reason, but the point is that rules should be clearly laid out. We shouldn't need to guess what they are. We shouldn't need to rely on "obvious" reasoning that may not be obvious to everyone.

<sup> - sfrohne [If you're going to post a screenshot of this comment, **don't** censor my username]</sup>
body_html:
Lol, Ruqqies, if you like hidden rules so much, then why do you hate reddit? It sounds like the perfect site for you!

There, you can go gloat about how "obvious" it is that posting about powermods is harassment, and how "obvious" it is that making subreddits about "election fraud" is impersonation!

Why do you think they don't let single accounts have more then 10 guilds

I don't know, maybe they thought it would be too hard to manage that many guilds with a single account? I know that's not the reason, but the point is that rules should be clearly laid out. We shouldn't need to guess what they are. We shouldn't need to rely on "obvious" reasoning that may not be obvious to everyone.

parent.body: Ruqqus preventing you from modding over 10 guilds with a message that you can only mod 10 if you attempt to mod or create an 11th one should have been enough for anyone with at least 2 brain cells to rub together. Yes @captainmeta4 does have some of the blame, but it's not like the limit was this mystical unknown that he's just now springing onto people. The 10 Guild limit was one of the main selling points so to say of Ruqqus.

body:
I literally said in my comment that I mod **8** guilds on each account in my hypothetical situation. If I have 8 guilds, I will never see that message unless I go looking in the source. How many users would you expect to do that?

I also never said that I didn't think the 10 guild limit existed. All my comments are about the clarity of the rules, not the fact that the limit exists.

<sup> - sfrohne [If you're going to post a screenshot of this comment, **don't** censor my username]</sup>
body_html:
I literally said in my comment that I mod 8 guilds on each account in my hypothetical situation. If I have 8 guilds, I will never see that message unless I go looking in the source. How many users would you expect to do that?

I also never said that I didn't think the 10 guild limit existed. All my comments are about the clarity of the rules, not the fact that the limit exists.

- sfrohne [If you're going to post a screenshot of this comment, don't censor my username]

Rules:

💻 No promotion of other sites that aren't a fork of Ruqqus

🟪 Ruqqus-related only. This is a community dedicated to Ruqqus meta discussion. Content may involve technology and politics but must have ample context in Ruqqus.

😀 Be civil. Be nice. Harassment, trolling, and disruptive behavior is not allowed. Basically, don’t be a jerk.

body:
Ruqqus may have problems of its own, but I still like it. At least it has less censorship than reddit.

Happy Thanksgiving!

<sup> - sfrohne [If you're going to post a screenshot of this comment, **don't** censor my username]</sup>

post.body: I'm not from the US where thanksgiving is a thing, but I thought seeing as it's a day of thanksgiving there, I'd like to thank everyone on this great platform who made it, make it and keep this place operating everyday. I've been here since about around late July and since then there hasn't been a day where I haven't visited ruqqus.com at least once. I always learn something new here and has been a force for good. 2020 without finding out about this great place legit would have been a much worse year. Thank you Ruqqus!

post.title: Thank you Ruqqus!
